Text: Hello February Hi Jon Thinking of you and thought Id try out your new email address Hope you are having a good dayIt snowed again last night but is suppose to warm up a bit today Dad got home late last night from Vancouver He said it was very nice there I forgot to tell you and Beth last time we talked that the pointsettia you gave Dad when he was in hospital at Christmas is still doing well The other ones I had are long gone Just thought you should know that it probably pays to spend the buck on them as it must mean they are better cared for during growth Also did you ever call Grandpa and what did he have to say I talked to him briefly last night but didnt want to ask if you had talked to him in case you hadnt He asked about you though and was of course pleased to hear you were working He has a very sore throat so I didnt talk very long Okay I dont want to take up too much of your time Love you Mum
Change of EMail address Cc PST Please note that our EMail address has been changed Our new address is Best regards Don Carol McKay
